Text:
@puplone: OK. Clean slate. No more escapades, please. I am one of the guys who wrote hDOT a decade ago,  understand me...

Point being, I am in torrents by nature exposed to  kind of public scrutiny, but I am at least twice older than majority here, I encode from 1989., I am in torrents for seven years now, on TPB two - and there is no question I haven't answered at least hundredth times. 
Here would come my friends, some of them from way long back, and I know that repeating same answers over and over again whenever some new face pops-out and start giving advices, or ask to many questions Why-this-Why-that makes them sick, as myself.
...

...
I repeat, I am too long in this jazz, to old and too sick to refute or answer on everything, especially in way one may find appropriate. 

I use English, as language of communication - but I am not Englishman - I have my own metrics, measuring stick and definitely a short temper. If anybody doesn't like me or my work - is two clicks away from eternal bliss and happiness. 

I never understood why people visit places they don't like. Also - from what background came urge of many people I met - to force their opinion or their ways - on me. I never met anyone here, I owe nothing, to nobody, as other "side" should accept too and apply as their MO too.

So - enjoy the ride and please - behave. I know you can.

Well, this was a nice surprise, never heard of it.
Thanks a lot, excellent quality 10/10.
Didn't know there was a Peter Pan made in '03. Thank you, I'll be grabbing this as well. [+1]
My second download EVER - so not computerfriendly but thank you thank you, beautifully done :)

@Twentyforty

Wow for someone who use's english regularly to communicate... your english is, well, terrible. I'd say you got a long ways to go, I didn't understand anything you said in both those rants.
